snippet: The Liverpool Reds and the Boston Red Sox, two of the sporting world’s most visible, storied and valuable franchises, are both struggling while sharing the same owner, John Henry.
abstract: Liverpool Reds soccer team and MLB's Boston Red Sox, two of the sporting world’s most visible, storied and valuable franchises, are both struggling while sharing the same owner, John Henry.
lead_paragraph: The Liverpool Reds and the Boston Red Sox, two of the sporting world’s most visible, storied and valuable franchises, are both struggling while sharing the same owner, John Henry.

headline.seo: Liverpool and Red Sox — Same Owner, Parallel Debacles
headline.main: For Liverpool and Red Sox, the Same Owner and Parallel Debacles
headline.print_headline: For Liverpool and Red Sox, the Same Owner and Parallel Debacles
